tab1.text1:
ðŸ‘‰ Respect the community â€” don't be an ass. Kindness and consideration are expected at all times.

1) Act like an adult.
Be mature and respectful in all chats and on Discord. Keep it drama-free; harassment and toxicity aren't tolerated.

2) Keep names appropriate.
Avoid inappropriate or "Human" character names; this applies to all languages. Final call rests with JJ.

3) Play fair.
Lost tames or items from normal gameplay or Wildcard bugs are not replaced.
Mutated or boss-level tames should not be gifted to new players â€” respect game progression.

4) Keep it constructive.
Report issues once; repeated complaints or rants clutter the cluster.

5) Build with awareness.
Give others space and stay clear of public structures.
Base limits per map:
- 1 main base
- 1 outpost / trap / treehouse
- 1 water pen for raising or storing water tames

6) Manage breeders responsibly.
Do not leave creatures on breed or wander.
Limit: 2 snails + 2 dung beetles (neutered).

7) Protect shared areas.
Leave resources, explorer notes, artifact caves, and public-use areas accessible.

8) Limit offline clutter.
Keep a max of 30 tames out while offline.
Set behavior so they don't cause chaos while you're gone.

9) Turret etiquette.
- Wilds Only
- Medium or Low range
- x50 damage
- ORP active

10) Clean as you go.
Structure pickup is ON â€” use it. Keep builds tidy and avoid spam.

11) Cloning chambers.
Max 1 cloning chamber per tribe, per map.

12) Choose tribe members wisely.
You are responsible for your tribe. Ongoing rule-breaking can result in a full tribe wipe and ban.

13) Ocean platforms.
Max of 4 large squares, or any combination equal to that footprint.
